case.title: Creating password which is currently in using

custom.preconds: 1.User has to open the browser http://mrbuggy.pl/ 2.User choose MrBuggy6 and download application on computer. 3.User hast to open and extract files with MrBuggy6 Application.
custom.steps: 1.User opens MrBuggy 6 application 2.User fills in ID and password fields 3.User clicks Sign in button. 4.On Hello Manager 2 screen user fills in password field and confirm password using popular password: 123456789 5.User clicks Save button
custom.expected: 1.Error message is displayed "The password is aldready used" 2.No possibility go to the next screen logging in. 3.The Save button is inactive.

case.title: Creating password with different content in fields : password and confim password

custom.preconds: 1.User has to open the browser http://mrbuggy.pl/ 2.User choose MrBuggy6 and download application on computer. 3.User hast to open and extract files with MrBuggy6 Application.
custom.steps: 1.User opens MrBuggy 6 application 2.User fills in ID and password fields 3.User clicks Sign in button. 4.On Hello Manager 2 screen user fills in password field using password rules. 5.User fills in confirm password field using different password than earlier steps. 6.User clicks Save button
custom.expected: 1.Error message is displayed "The repeated password is different from the given password". 2.No possibility go to the next screen logging in. 3.The Save button is inactive.

case.title: Creating password according with password rules

custom.preconds: 1.User has to open the browser http://mrbuggy.pl/ 2.User choose MrBuggy6 and download application on computer. 3.User hast to open and extract files with MrBuggy6 Application.
custom.steps: 1.User opens MrBuggy 6 application 2.User fills in ID and password fields 3.User clicks Sign in button. 4.On Hello Manager 2 screen user fills in password field using password according with password rules. 5.User fills in confirm password field using data from password field 6.User clicks Save button
custom.expected: 1.Error message is not displayed. 2.User goes to the next screen logging in.

case.title: Creating password - the number of the characters in password fields

custom.preconds: 1.User has to open the browser http://mrbuggy.pl/ 2.User choose MrBuggy6 and download application on computer. 3.User hast to open and extract files with MrBuggy6 Application.
custom.steps: 1.User opens MrBuggy 6 application 2.User fills in ID and password fields 3.User clicks Sign in button. 4.On Hello Manager 2 screen user fills in password field using the max number of characters. 5.User fills in confirm password field using the max number of characters.
custom.expected: The max number of characters in password and confirm password is the same.

case.title: Creating password with empty password field

custom.preconds: 1.User has to open the browser http://mrbuggy.pl/ 2.User choose MrBuggy6 and download application on computer. 3.User hast to open and extract files with MrBuggy6 Application.
custom.steps: 1.User opens MrBuggy 6 application 2.User fills in ID and password fields 3.User clicks Sign in button. 4.On Hello Manager 2 screen user does not fill in password field. 5.User fills in confirm password field according with password rules. 6.User clicks Save button
custom.expected: 1.Error message is displayed: "The field is required". 2.No possibility go to the next screen logging in. 3.The Save button is inactive.

custom.expected: 1.Error message is displayed: "The field is required". 2.No possibility go to the next screen logging in. 3.The Save button is inactive.

custom.expected: No possibility enter 21 characters in the password field, the field accepts up to 20 characters

custom.expected: 1.Error message is not displayed. 2.User goes to the next screen logging in. 3.The Save button is sctive.

case.title: Logging in application with valid username and valid password

custom.preconds: 1.User has to open the browser http://mrbuggy.pl/ 2.User choose MrBuggy6 and download application on computer. 3.User hast to open and extract files with MrBuggy6 Application.
custom.steps: 1.User opens MrBuggy6 application. 2.User fills in Identifier and Password fields 3.User clicks Sign in button. 4.User fills in Password and Confirm password fields on Hello Manager2 screen. 5.User clicks Save button. 5.User fills in valid Username (initial username:manager 2) and vallid Password on Login screen. 7.User clicks Login button
custom.expected: 1.Error message is not displayed. 2.The user is correctly logged in. 3.User sees dashboard.

case.title: Logging in to the system as Manager with Admin 's passsword

custom.preconds: 1.User has to open the browser http://mrbuggy.pl/ 2.User choose MrBuggy6 and download application on computer. 3.User hast to open and extract files with MrBuggy6 Application.
custom.steps: 1.User opens MrBuggy6 application. 2.User fills in Identifier and Password fields 3.User clicks Sign in button. 4.User fills in Password and Confirm password fields on Hello Manager2 screen. 5.User clicks Save button. 5.User fills in valid Username (initial username:manager 2) 6.User fills in field Password: admin 7.User clicks Login button
custom.expected: 1.Error message is displayed: "Incorrect login and/or password" 2.The user is not logged in. 3.User does not see dashboard.

case.title: Logging in to the system as Admin with Manager 's passsword

custom.preconds: 1.User has to open the browser http://mrbuggy.pl/ 2.User choose MrBuggy6 and download application on computer. 3.User hast to open and extract files with MrBuggy6 Application.
custom.steps: 1.User opens MrBuggy6 application. 2.User fills in Identifier and Password fields 3.User clicks Sign in button. 4.User fills in Password and Confirm password fields on Hello Manager2 screen. 5.User clicks Save button. 5.User fills in valid Username: admin 6.User fills in field Password using manager's password 7.User clicks Login button
custom.expected: 1.Error message is displayed: "Incorrect login and/or password" 2.The user is not logged in. 3.User does not see dashboard.

section.name: Logging in application with empty field

case.title: Logging in application with empty username field

custom.preconds: 1.User has to open the browser http://mrbuggy.pl/ 2.User choose MrBuggy6 and download application on computer. 3.User hast to open and extract files with MrBuggy6 Application.
custom.steps: 1.User opens MrBuggy6 application. 2.User fills in Identifier and Password fields 3.User clicks Sign in button. 4.User fills in Password and Confirm password fields on Hello Manager2 screen. 5.User clicks Save button. 5.User does not fill in Username field 6.User fills in field Password using valid password 7.User clicks Login button
custom.expected: 1.Error message is displayed "The field is required". Additionally on screen is displayed error message "Incorrect login and/or password" 2.The user is not logged in. 3.User does not see dashboard.

case.title: Logging in application with empty password field

custom.steps: 1.User opens MrBuggy6 application. 2.User fills in Identifier and Password fields 3.User clicks Sign in button. 4.User fills in Password and Confirm password fields on Hello Manager2 screen. 5.User clicks Save button. 5.User fills in Username field using valid username 6.User does not fill in password field 7.User clicks Login button
custom.expected: 1.Error message is displayed "The field is required". Additionally on screen is displayed error message "Incorrect login and/or password" 2.The user is not logged in. 3.User does not see dashboard.

custom.expected: 1.Error message is displayed "The field is required". Additionally on screen is displayed error message "Incorrect login and/or password" 2.The user is not logged in. 3.User does not see dashboard.

custom.expected: 1.Error message is displayed "Incorrect login and/or password" 2.The user is not logged in. 3.User does not see dashboard.

custom.expected: 1.Error message is displayed "Incorrect login and/or password" 2.The user is not logged in. 3.User does not see dashboard.

section.name: Editing profile of user with special characters

case.title: Editing Phone Number with special characters

custom.preconds: 1.User has to open the browser http://mrbuggy.pl/ 2.User choose MrBuggy6 and download application on computer. 3.User hast to open and extract files with MrBuggy6 Application.
custom.steps: 1.User opens MrBuggy6 application. 2.User fills in Identifier and Password fields 3.User clicks Sign in button. 4.User fills in Password and Confirm password fields on Hello Manager2 screen. 5.User clicks Save button. 5.User fills in login form using valid username and valid password 6.User goes to profile's tab 7.User clicks EDIT 8.User changes only phone number using special characters 9.User clicks Save button
custom.expected: 1.The update phone number is correctly displayed. 2.All functions of applications are in operation according with requirements.

custom.expected: 1.The update phone number is correctly displayed. 2.All functions of applications are in operation according with requirements.

section.name: Editing profile of user - change role

case.title: Editing whole profile except Role (logging out and again logging in)

custom.preconds: 1.User has to open the browser http://mrbuggy.pl/ 2.User choose MrBuggy6 and download application on computer. 3.User hast to open and extract files with MrBuggy6 Application.
custom.steps: 1.User opens MrBuggy6 application. 2.User fills in Identifier and Password fields 3.User clicks Sign in button. 4.User fills in Password and Confirm password fields on Hello Manager2 screen. 5.User clicks Save button. 6.User fills in login form using valid username and valid password 8.User goes to profile's tab and clicks EDIT 9.User changes whole profile except role 10.User clicks Save button 11.User logs out.
custom.expected: 1.Error message is not displayed. 2.The update data are correctly displayed. 3.All functions of applications are in operation according with requirements.

case.title: Editing profile of user -change role to admin

custom.preconds: 1.User has to open the browser http://mrbuggy.pl/ 2.User choose MrBuggy6 and download application on computer. 3.User hast to open and extract files with MrBuggy6 Application.
custom.steps: 1.User opens MrBuggy6 application. 2.User fills in Identifier and Password fields 3.User clicks Sign in button. 4.User fills in Password and Confirm password fields on Hello Manager2 screen. 5.User clicks Save button. 6.User fills in login form using valid username and valid password 7.User goes to profile's tab and clicks EDIT 8.User changes role to admin 9.User clicks Save button
custom.expected: 1.Error message is displayed:" You can not change the role to Admin". 2.The Save button is inactive. 3.No possibbility to save a role update

case.title: Changing role to Employee- logging out and again logging in

custom.preconds: 1.User has to open the browser http://mrbuggy.pl/ 2.User choose MrBuggy6 and download application on computer. 3.User hast to open and extract files with MrBuggy6 Application.
custom.steps: 1.User opens MrBuggy6 application. 2.User fills in Identifier and Password fields 3.User clicks Sign in button. 4.User fills in Password and Confirm password fields on Hello Manager2 screen. 5.User clicks Save button. 5.User fills in login form using valid username and valid password 6.User goes to profile's tab and clicks EDIT 7.User changes role to employee 8.User clicks Save button 9.User goes to logout and again logs in.
custom.expected: 1.Error message is not displayed. 2.The update data are correctly displayed. 3.All functions of applications are in operation according with requirements.

custom.expected: 1.Error message is not displayed. 2.The update data are correctly displayed. 3.All functions of applications are in operation according with requirements.

case.title: Logging in on Manager 1 account with Manager 2 password

custom.preconds: 1.User has to open the browser http://mrbuggy.pl/ 2.User choose MrBuggy6 and download application on computer. 3.User hast to open and extract files with MrBuggy6 Application.
custom.steps: 1.User opens MrBuggy6 Application and signs in as Manager 2. 2.User logs out and change username to Manager 1 and use Manager 2 password to log in. 3.User logs out and logs in as Manager 2 for the second time. 4.User opens profile's tab and changes password. 5.User clicks Save button. 6.User logs out and tries log in using username Manager 1 and new Manager 2 password.
custom.expected: Manager 1 password is set to initial password of Manager2. If Manager 2 change the password - Manager1 will keep the previous one.
